import React, { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { datVeAction, layChiTietPhongVeAction } from '../../redux/actions/QuanLyDatVeAction'; import { CloseOutlined, UserOutlined, CheckOutlined, AppleOutlined, AndroidOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { Tabs } from 'antd'; import style from './Checkout.module.css'; import './Checkout.css'; import _ from 'lodash'; import { DAT_GHE } from '../../redux/types/QuanLyDatVeType'; function Checkout(props) { const { userLogin } = useSelector(state => state.QuanLyNguoiDungReducer); const { chiTietPhongVe, danhSachGheDangDat } = useSelector(state => state.QuanLyDatVeReducer); const { thongTinPhim, danhSachGhe } = chiTietPhongVe; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const renderSeats = () => { return danhSachGhe?.map((ghe, index) => { let classGheVip = ghe.loaiGhe === 'Vip' ? 'gheVip' : ''; let classGheDaDat = ghe.daDat === true ? 'gheDaDat' : ''; let classGheDangDat = ''; let indexGheDD = danhSachGheDangDat.findIndex(gheDD => gheDD.maGhe === ghe.maGhe); if (indexGheDD != -1) { classGheDaDat = 'gheDangDat'; } let classGheCuaMinh = ''; if (userLogin.taiKhoan === ghe.taiKhoanNguoiDat) { classGheCuaMinh = 'gheCuaMinh'; } return {(index + 1) % 13 === 0 ?
: ''} ; }); }; useEffect(() => { dispatch(layChiTietPhongVeAction(props.match.params.id)); }, []); return (
